manual/index.html.keywords: A logger that allows you to filter logs based on a generic enum bitfield parameter Install via Git URL You can also use the "Install from Git URL" option from Unity Package Manager to install the package. https://github.com/BDeshiDev/BDeshiHelpers.git#upm
